ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Skills questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks everyone for the info on not using special skills when trying ID.  I didn t know that and have been using it wrong.  (    I push tiger claw as fast as I
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks everyone for the info on not using special skills when trying ID. I
didn't know that and have been using it wrong. ( I push tiger claw as
fast as I can, hehe, most of the time I hit it before it comes up as being
ready.

Hopefully I'll have better luck in the future with ID now.




-----Original Message-----
From: Dizzy J. [mailto:dizzyj@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 16, 2000 2:29 PM
To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Skills questions

From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>

at an ID skill lvl of 108 I can suscesfully pass the skill
check multiple
times a fight against a hard blue.

I was able to solo the firescale crock (~lvl 30) at lvl 33,
with id
working 3 times, 2 of thoes were back to back.

id put every point into it you can, then go out and purchace
a gravis
digital extream game pad, and set up a macro to practice it
over night.
(you dont have to fear something to make a skill increase,
so I target a
mecrchent and go feign next to a guard).

also, as someone mentioned, you cannot have a special skill
greyed out
when the skill check happens (the your not scaring anyone
message). so I
alternate between flying kick and ID.
